description:
After a hard knock to the head, Catarina Claes regains all of her memories from her previous life as a modern-day high schooler and realizes that she is now the selfish, haughty villainess character from an otome game that she was obsessed with. She immediately takes action in hopes of avoiding the destruction flags that doomed her character in the game: exile in the best case scenario and death in the worst.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Recalled the Memories of My Past Life...
Oups, je me suis rappelé ma vie antérieure...
Zense no Kioku o Omoidashite Shimatta...
前世の記憶を思い出してしまった...
